name: Haunted Hallway
description:
Run for your life!

Plundering an ancient tomb for treasure, the courageous Adventure Bob has gotten in a bit over his head. Escape from ghastly ghouls, skeletons, bats and traps in this action packed platforming adventure!

Haunted Hallway features clever level design and fantastic platforming challenges. Be sure to collect as many coins as you can to boost your score. If you’re feeling particularly brave, you can grab diamonds for an extra challenge.

With some of the best touchscreen platforming controls available, Haunted Hallway will have you coming back again and again.

Features:
- Challenge mode with 24 levels
- Endless mode
- Game Center leaderboards and achievements
- iCade support
- iControlPad support through iCade emulation

Follow Uncade on Twitter: @UncadeGames

Gameplay Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hGeabkIdHRo

*** This game does not support 1st and 2nd generation devices. It supports the iPhone 3GS, iPod Touch 3rd gen (32gb), iPad 1 and up.
